text:
Helmut Hubacher (15 April 1926 – 19 August 2020) was a Swiss politician. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party of Switzerland. From 1963 to 1997, he was a member of the National Council. He was born in Krauchthal, Switzerland.
Hubacher died on 19 August 2020 in Porrentruy, Switzerland at the age of 94.
